title: When my team lets me play an off-meta support. . . .

Beginning of the match,

replies.body:
When your 0/12 top lane Riven blames you for losing the game cause you picked something off-meta.


https://38.media.tumblr.com/e817a6c110b05127b2078c6ec6b82709/tumblr_inline_o36l3b5aj71tjufl6_500.gif
Lol, I remember watching that scene the first time thinking _"Did she just crack... grass?"_

She's just that Toph!

. . . .I'll go now. . . .
that pun physically hurt me
Toph loves it though, just watch the show and you'll see yourself.
to the Toph with you
What is toph?

> [{quoted}](name=Embertine,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=O3gn8m7I,comment-id=000200000001,timestamp=2016-03-31T19:27:20.314+0000)
>
> She's just that Toph!
> 
> . . . .I'll go now. . . .

I love you for this comment <3
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
Yes. Yes she did.
Grassbender Toph
underneath grass is rocks and what not right? I mean it makes some sense.
I don't thin there wasn't a singe Toph moment I didn't like about Avatar. Come to think of it, I don't think there was anything i didn't like about Avatar...well expect for his reincarnation.

I hated most of S1 tbh.

Zuko and Iroh were both really annoying, and Sokka was kinda snotty. I get that was supposed to be the point but all the characters were stereotypes for the majority of Season 1.

Katara: Mother figure
Sokka: Comic relief/Annoying brother
Zuko: Generic villain
Iroh: Comic relief for the "bad" side
Aang: "Fun-loving kid with a tragic past, repressing his memories

Aang is really the only one that's pushing it at all, but the rest are really predictable.

However, the end of S1 was amazing.
Just bought the complete series to binge watch it and see the whole thing all over again. I almost cried tears of joy when I saw the complete series sitting in a single pack on the store shelf.
iunno, Iroh is up there in my list of cool guys. Well, I don't remember S1 much. Maybe he was unimpressive back then? All I know is that later in the series he gets a 9/10.
Had a ranked game recently where my top laner went 0/13/0. Blamed it on our Pantheon ADC's csing.

2/13/17.....so you stole 2 kill, that's on you. Don't do that.
13 deaths, holy crap...your team must've been caught out often for you to have to sacrifice yourself 13 times. Goodjob on being the meat shield for your team!
17 assists, Not bad....helping quite a ton in securing kills.

All round, nice supporting.
If only your team didn't need someone to die for them Kappa
Kappa Kappa.
You say kill steal, I say kill secure. After all ADCs have not taken ignite in almost two years.
Only baddies say "omg you steal my kill"
Sion support FTW.
is actually really good
If Toph was a champion, I'd main her
We all would.
100% banrate.
Playrate*
no no, if I can ban my entire enemy teams main I do that one.
But, if you do that, you're also banning YOUR teams main!
:D
Definitely Not Malphite skin incoming.
Nope. MEOWKAI

More like:
2 minutes in: {{champion:33}} RAMMUS SUPPORT IS LEGIT, MOTHER FUCKERS! WOOOOOOOOOOO

20 minutes in:

{{champion:33}} 0/12/4 Why did I do this?

I once did an master yi and rammus bot with both {{summoner:6}} {{summoner:4}} and some MS items.
They didnt knew what overcome them and it was hella fun.
Can I Get a sonic montage here.
whaaat how dare you diss rammy support, just build the coin and play passive af then late game make a beeline for their adc or someone important and you'll basically wreck their faces for existing
Rammus support is good, it's just that I can't play him any good
the only time i hit my q on an enemy champ is when i flash =/....  i'm better off playing maokai

Had a team let me go Soraka top the other day.
Lane phase went better than expected. Only died 3 times (Annie TP ganks are brutal).

Once team fights kicked in though.... 
Between me and Sona, our Volibear was effectively immortal. They couldn't even harass. XD
{{champion:113}} support is legit guys, i swear !!
Kind of similar to {{champion:89}}, honestly.

> [{quoted}](name=Jexym,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=O3gn8m7I,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-03-31T20:38:22.028+0000)
>
> {{champion:113}} support is legit guys, i swear !!

To be honest why wouldn't it be? XD

about a week ago lost several games of rank. went full tilt and played Beast Hunter Sejuani with my brother on Beast Hunter Draven in bot lane.

we won. and also snagged an awesome ult and baron steal while i was at it. Sej Support gets shut down hard in some comps, but against a Raka and MF i just dove the pig and fed the Stache.
You will find a pond of my  tears bot lane because that's where the enemy {{champion:7}} support is.

*is shaco or teemo*

what you didn't trust me?

*is 5/3/20

my traps be dank

(shaco can ignore getting himself flash so you can pack ignite or smite for the lols

i'd say exhaust has more value than smite, but perhaps heal or even teleport, lol, the shaco roams XD can you imagine the top or mid laner screaming as shaco suddenly bursts out of the bushes with a clone when they hadn't seen him anywhere but bottom lane? and just for more fun, you can drop a box on your way to gank and they have to divert their course or end up killing themselves in the process

you can take exhaust and one other active but I like to take smite to help with jungle pressure and the jungle items are basically more cost efficient sightstones with better upgrades (because they give you more than hp) and with smite you can take dragon really fast with whoever your jungler is, as well as help push the wave by smiting the siege minion to half health it, or you could skip the wards because shaco boxes and get yourself a nice chilling smite for an extra slow and some true damage.

shaco actually can use pretty much every summoner very well in every position with the only mandatory one being smite in the jungle. Other than that free to pick whatever you want

Played against a Riven support yesterday. I destroyed her as Morg support and made sure she knew she was bad from the get-go. That's not going off meta, that's just being a shit and thinking you're too good to play a real support.

When I ask my team if they would mind if I played a off-meta jungler. Shyvanna autolocks jg and says for me to go top if im going to do that crap. I lock Bard top and fought a Garen. Spent the entire game easily out farming the Garen and wrecking him though I never killed him. Garen roams from top when I think he backed and kills Shy. Shy rages blaming the fact im playing Bard. Come late game and we win I was 11/0/10 in a 37 min match a item from full build but I didnt back to buy it. She blames me for saying that I sat back and ks'd. Check the graph I have most damage to champion on my team and practically saved everyone on my team dozens of time and she reports me :P. Check my match history if you dont believe me. Off meta rocks. I suggest Mord jg.

AD bard and top bard are actually things now.

it's a ton of fun to play bard as a support carry...he's actually the only TRUE support carry...soraka will kill herself, Sona scales solely off of AP and mana(of course her group stun is fun though), Nami AD was a thing somewhere, but I rarely have he 6300 IP for her, but lol, that crowd control, heal and damage makes it acceptable
{{champion:75}} "Support"
Done it, got an S- ranking out of it. Was accused by other team of try-harding.
Avatar = upvotes.
